post.body: never made it to the #Segafredo, but hit up the #Tokyo+Show for some healthy fruit juice and a sweet potato muffin.
Congratulations! Nice low-key approach.. thanks for sharing the video!
you're not just saying that because you know a few pf us (at #iKnow!), are you? ;) Thanks for your great feedback!
I am also trying to gather my thoughts from the #Yokohama Triennnale 2008, which I went to a week ago. Omoshiroi, desu ne?
not sure why I'm double tweeting... Maybe #SwitchaBit is stuck in a #Twitter-#Facebook loopyloop?
you can go ahead and create a Farsi list on #iKnow! Give it a shot!
how did you know about my social media sponsorship? ;)
we're having an unofficial #Cerego staff get-together tonight... @dominiek is heading back to Amsterdam for the holidays.
how are you?
how dare you blame the #hashtag's, let alone not use one when writing the word #hashtag! ;)
is @loiclemeur's talk on the web?
sounds great. So when are you going to swing by Japan? And why don't you get him started on #iKnow!?
I will be leaving for NYC in a week. Do you have special plans for New Years?
hope you are having a great day filled with good food!
hope you have a wonderful holiday!
You gotta love Katz's Deli... that hard salami is totemo oishii!
Thanks! It's 12-14 hours, depending upon which direction you're flying in. I'll ping you when I'm in EST.
are you at #Narita? If so, which terminal?
congrats on 500 tweets completed, haha! ;)
radical transparency and #SwitchaBit are a marriage made in heaven!
sounds like you guys are enjoying #Tokyo. Yo should stop by the #Cerego/#iKnow! office tomorrow!
just started this #iKnow! course: French - English http://iknow.co.jp/list/32417
is on his way into the office on a pretty mild day... actually slept more than 6 hours last night - hooray!
just started this #iKnow! course: Talk dirty in the sexiest language - Spanish http://iknow.co.jp/list/34337
is going to grab a coffee at #Segafredo after hitting up the #Apple store... then back to work at #iKnow!
is on the move, grabbing some #Starbucks lunch. All meetings at #iKnow! this morning.
just started this #iKnow! course: 1337 speak http://iknow.co.jp/list/34996.
just started this #iKnow! course: 1337 speak http://iknow.co.jp/list/34996
getting a little food at the wine bar in #Shibuya...
just started this #iKnow! course: Popular Messier Objects http://iknow.co.jp/list/34192.
just started this #iKnow! course: Popular Messier Objects http://iknow.co.jp/list/34192
just started this #iKnow! course: Swedish for tourists http://iknow.co.jp/list/31594.
just started this #iKnow! course: Swedish for tourists http://iknow.co.jp/list/31594
just started this #iKnow! course: マリア「つぼみ」♪ http://iknow.co.jp/list/31418.
my guess is that the people who start following me are different from those who stop following me... or maybe I tweet too much about #iKnow!
is contemplating the mystery behind the # of people following me... and why it sometimes drops by 1 or 2, even if I haven't tweeted...
is at the #Cerego office on a Saturday afternoon... not really the hackathon @dominiek conceived of, but nice tunes and a little #iKnow!
needs to get in to better habits of leaving the office at a "normal" hour, getting more sleep, drinking/eating less and exercising more...
Listing to some #Minilogue on#songza... http://songza.com/z/dbrpub
is looking forward to his trip to New York in less than a week... so much to get done before then!
wishes everyone a Merry X-Mas, but a special shout out is reserved for you #atheists out there!
is heading out for a family dinner on X-Mas Eve. Kinda ironic for an atheistic half-jew... but I wish you all a Mery X-Mas nevertheless!
Needs to get the holidays out of the way so I can curb my eating... and drinking for that matter! #diet #health
just got some nice #tennis gear at one of the few remaining real pro shops in Philly. Now I have test out my ankle!
is enjoying a little #Philly nightlife and ready to (maybe) eat a cheesesteak. Yeah, baby!
is in #Rittenhouse+Square giving a shout out to my godson JJ. Hey!!!
is hanging out at Jeff's new office in Washington Square in the city of brotherly love
is on the way to Philly to visit his godson. Yeah, baby!
is in New York city, up early due to jet lag, pounding away at work emails!
remind me never to book a flight departing #Narita on the Saturday before #X-Mas. This is a LONG line to check in to ANA econom class!.
just started this #iKnow! course: Brazilian Portuguese: A Bela e a Fera 『Beauty and The Beast』 http://iknow.co.jp/list/36579
just started this #iKnow! course: רוצה בנות/Rotze Banot/I Want Girls - חובבי ציון/Chovevei Tzion http://iknow.co.jp/list/36938
